evidence.claim: Brilliantly utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The platform adheres to HIPAA compliance standards for health data security.
Brilliantly integrates with third-party EHR systems using FHIR standards.
The use of Amazon RDS for relational database storage is outlined in their technical documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transactions or related healthcare data exchange use cases.
